title: Deploy application to Internet Computer mainnet

requirements.text: Deploy both backend and frontend canisters to the Internet Computer mainnet network using `dfx deploy --network ic`, ensuring all canisters are successfully installed and running on the production network.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister deploys successfully to mainnet without errors
The frontend canister deploys successfully to mainnet without errors
Both canisters receive valid mainnet canister IDs
The deployment process completes without build or compilation errors
The mainnet frontend URL is accessible and loads without errors

requirements.text: Verify the deployed mainnet frontend can successfully connect to the deployed mainnet backend canister and load all core application data including lessons list, practice problems, and user progress.
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend successfully initializes the actor with the mainnet canister ID
The lessons browser page loads and displays all lessons from the backend
Practice problems load correctly in both practice area and practice mode
Progress tracking page can fetch and display user data
No CORS or network configuration errors appear in the browser console

requirements.text: Verify Internet Identity authentication works correctly on the mainnet deployment, allowing users to successfully log in, maintain authenticated sessions across page refreshes, and access all authenticated features including progress tracking and lesson completion.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can successfully authenticate using Internet Identity on mainnet
Authenticated sessions persist correctly across page refreshes
The Navigation component correctly displays login/logout states
Authenticated users can mark lessons as complete
Authenticated users can submit practice scores and view their progress
The authentication flow does not produce errors in production

requirements.text: Verify all static assets including generated brainrot-themed images (mascot characters, achievement badges, lesson illustrations) stored in frontend/public/assets/generated are correctly deployed and accessible from the mainnet frontend canister.
acceptanceCriteria: All images in frontend/public/assets/generated are included in the mainnet deployment
Achievement badges render correctly in the ProgressDashboard component
The mascot image displays correctly on the homepage
All image URLs resolve successfully without 404 errors
Images load with appropriate performance and without CORS issues

requirements.text: Configure production-appropriate canister settings for the mainnet deployment including sufficient cycles allocation to ensure the application remains available and responsive under normal usage patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: Both canisters are funded with sufficient cycles for sustained operation
Canister settings include appropriate compute allocation for production workloads
Memory allocation is configured to handle expected data growth
The deployment includes monitoring or alerting for low cycle balances
Cycle consumption rates are documented for maintenance planning

constraints: Use the standard Internet Computer mainnet deployment workflow with `dfx deploy --network ic`
Preserve the existing single-actor backend architecture in main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui
Ensure all existing functionality (lessons, practice problems, progress tracking, authentication) continues to work correctly on mainnet
Maintain the existing neon green brainrot-themed visual design
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond deployment
Changing the technology stack or framework choices
Modifying the visual design or theme
Adding new math topics or lesson content
Setting up custom domains or DNS configuration
Creating automated deployment pipelines or CI/CD workflows
